item.title: Synology How Do I Update the Images Against a Tag in the Docker View?
item.description: So when you use docker with Synology it has a rather nice UI.. However it seems to be lacking things. Such as redownloading the images for any given tag as the SHAs don’t change but the tags do! -_- Saying that; this addition is nice: – Turns out adding itself over itself doesn’t work. And you can’t add the update by a different tag name and switch the tag on an “off” container.
